ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 2
ygData.msgSnippet: I m on Xegony and would be happy to participate in some language exercises. Also does anyone know WHAT language the Wizard books are in? ... research.  Please
ygData.messageBody:
I'm on Xegony and would be happy to participate in some language exercises.

Also does anyone know WHAT language the Wizard books are in?

At 02:19 PM 5/9/99 -0500, you wrote:
>From: Jame Scholl <satyric@...>

>with every two-line response. Thanks. :)
